section.title: Introduction
section.para: FlyMine is an integrated database of genomic, expression and protein data for Drosophila and Anopheles. Accessible online, users can access a library of pre-defined queries or construct their own using a powerful query builder interface.
Full user documentation is available. For further information about FlyMine please consult the more detailed introduction.
Start a query using FlyMine. See quick start guide for more details.
